text:
Thanks for getting back to us!
We‚Äôre sorry to say but it seems your order has been lost in transit as the tracking has stopped updating.
We know how frustrating this can be, so we are more than happy to get this resolved!
We'd love to get a replacement order sent out, depending on stock levels - if you would like us to do this, could you please confirm the full address that you would like the order delivered to?
Alternatively, we can issue an e-gift card for the value of the order.
We look forward to your reply. ü¶à
